website_summaries.verdict: A basic starter set with decent battery life for a budget-priced model – great for young kids.
pros: Multi-player mode is great if you have other laser guns that are compatible
cons: Some malfunction problems when guns are handled roughly
Not as many game settings as other options

customer_reviews.title: Seems you have to turn off to reset a match.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product but you seem to have to turn it off to reset a death. I haven't found a button press combo that resets a death other than turning it off. So that's why I only give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hocks

customer_reviews.title: I think it is a great purchase. Kids are having a blast
customer_reviews.text: Lasertag guns arrived in mail yesterday. Guns feel really responsive and receive hits well, vibration on firing and hits, multiple firing modes, and can have multiple teams. For this price point, I think it is a great purchase. Kids are having a blast, and Dad too :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it, because no need to search and pick ...
customer_reviews.text: my 6 year old loves it. I like it, because no need to search and pick up nerf bullets everywhere. plus can be used outside. good range, and very fun item.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CHOICE
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely loves these. I wish I would have bought the 4 pack but wanted to try before investing. Bought these for my 15yr old and 11 yr old and they play with these things in the house and outside. They love having draws :). I think this was a great investment. I loved the simple design, no small parts to keep up with. The kids like reloading and changing the different gun features. The product has held up to basic wear and tear. I have not even had to replace the batteries yet and its been 7 months since they received the toys. As soon as I can, I will be purchasing 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: like it

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, better than most other brands
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought Laser X set, those were junk, didnt register hits, so I bought these since they were the rated the second best Laser tag set available for a decent price. They're well worth it. They're sturdy feeling, great sound and many options, register most hits even from the side. At further distances more than 15 feet you do have to be accurate and point right at the other gun, so you cant just random fire at your opponant. One of the switches doesnt click up when its turned on, it stays so far but that's the only down side I've noticed, on/off switches seem a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, many have defects though. Had to send two back received from another distribution company.
customer_reviews.author: Damj

customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a shared gift for 9 and 4 year old sons, they LOVE them! Even better then I expected, the sensory feedback like noises, lights and vibration when shot or hit are awesome. Easy enough to use and light enough for my younger son to use too. We haven't tried them outdoors yet, so not sure how good they will work on bright days but work very nicely indoors. Would definitely buy again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Fun when they aren’t broken
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t decide between these and Lazer X. Based on price, I went with these. I was shipped a broken gun and once that was taken care of, these guns are awesome! Lots of reviews of receiving damaged items so leave extra time if you’re ordering for a deadline. Customer service is very helpful in replacing. We have 6 guns that all work so easily together. They aren’t heavy so little ones can easily handle them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pam J.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for All
customer_reviews.text: We loved these so much, we purchased more! My kids got these as gifts and the only downside was that we didn't have enough for everyone to play. Every time my kids have friends over, they take these out and have lots of fun! The adults often get in on the action too. It's great exercise and entertains them for hours. I recommend buying enough for everyone to join in the fun. Just tell the kids not to drop them. They get glitchy.
customer_reviews.author: A Bookman

customer_reviews.title: Work great together and with the Dynasty bug and Dynasty guns
customer_reviews.text: Work great together and with the Dynasty bug and Dynasty guns. This was the hit of Christmas with my son, myself, uncles and even my mother-in-law was interested. The kids will use them too. This toy won't sit collecting dust. We pull them out a couple times a week since Christmas and haven't had to charge the batteries yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T Demitropoulos

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, not excessively loud, easy to hold.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, especially for my 6 yo, 2.5 yo, and man-child husband. It’s easy to play, not excessively loud, and offers the option for 8 guns. I knocked off 1 Star bc of the relatively short range, but only my husband has complained about that, the kids don’t know any different. We will be purchasing more guns!
customer_reviews.author: Marianna

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is great! The instructions are pretty bad, so I'd take a star off, but the actual toy is so good that it simply doesn't deserve less than 5 stars. Keep in mind that the sensors are infrared technology and that bounces. So it gets to be fun indoors when trying to shoot at an opponent around the corner when you can't see them - simply shoot the wall opposite them and, if directed at the correct angle, will hit the target. All in all, this is a toy that will probably be fun for many years and I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: WAM

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Compatible
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to add to one gun we previously had from Dynasty toys. They are completely compatible and work great. I love that the sensors are on the guns themselves and there is no other pieces that are worn. We also purchased amazon rechargeable batteries to keep the fun going.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rolland

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: These were a great hit. Bought these for my 9 year old. So far my husband loves them my son loves them my dad loves them my nephews love them. Literally everyone wants to play with these of ll ages. We definitely want to buy more. Id recommend rechargable batteries for sure
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Rikki Rocha

customer_reviews.title: 50% broken for $45
customer_reviews.text: Should be Zero stars. Ordered set of two guns, one has trigger that doesn't work. White gun powers up, changes modes, but does not respond to trigger. Fresh batteries, recycle power switch, press all the other buttons, still no trigger. $45 for nothing. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Dendulk

customer_reviews.title: Fun with another player but LOUD.
customer_reviews.text: Great toy to play with an opponent. You have to aim and shoot and the opponent’s life goes down. You can see it on their gun! We thought there was laser beams but there isn’t. And there is no sound control. It is LOUD.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Time to have fun!
customer_reviews.text: Best boy present. All of my 3 sons got these for Christmas they all work great and I have no bullets to clean up. Love the reload and the different shooting options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had issues but Customer Service was GREAT
customer_reviews.text: One of the laser guns did not work but the customer service department was quick to issue me a ticket to return the product and a credit to my account. I think if they would have both worked, this would have been a fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: Coco Texas

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Really fun. Could be a little more user friendly. Hard to understand how to program them (pick which type of “gun” you’re using). But my kids love them and have fun with them
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T

customer_reviews.title: The adults had great fun, and kids
customer_reviews.text: These guns work well but they're difficult for younger children because there is no laser beam to follow so they don't really know how/where to aim. We purchased cheap cat toy lasers to strap to the guns to help with aiming. The adults had great fun, and kids, with some help, will enjoy them too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: Good active fun for the kiddos! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. Good active fun for the kiddos! Descent accuracy, but could be a tad bit better. Good buy though for the price! Would buy again!😊
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: SUPER Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I play this every weekend. The different gun selection makes it challenging. We have played both indoors and out. The work equally as well in both locations. The guns pick up the "hits" from the other guns well. I also purchased a little spider target and we have a lot of fun shooting it with these guns.
customer_reviews.author: Jc7

customer_reviews.title: Only one gun works
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 2 pack and only one of the guns work. So disappointed with this Christmas gift. Whatever happened to Quality Control? It sounds like this is a recurring problem with this company and product. They should be more accommodating with exchanges, especially after getting a child excited about the toy only to have them crushed when they find out they don’t work and can’t play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun idea but one gun doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Just like other reviewers, one gun (blue) doesn't work. I bought 2 sets so at least 3 guns work but wondering if I should bother reordering a new set? They are fun and have good distance.
customer_reviews.author: dre

customer_reviews.title: Good but some had no sound
customer_reviews.text: if you receive a working set i believe you will enjoy this product. I bought the set of 4 and 2 more laser guns but two of them didn't have sound. Otherwise, we had fun the one night we played with them.
customer_reviews.author: John Murray

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: Updated. I had a problem with the screws stripping but eventually I remedied the issue. My kid loves this toy and so do I. I can’t tell you how much fun we have with them. They are heavy duty and user friendly. Super fun. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Angee

customer_reviews.title: This set is just so much fun. My 10 year old granddaughter has called me ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is just so much fun. My 10 year old granddaughter has called me twice to tell me about the times she has brought it to her friends homes. At Christmas I bought 3 sets for my daughter's family and the whole family played with it non-stop; ages from 4 years to 70 years had great fun playing inside the house while an ice storm raged outside.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: I bought 8 for Xmas for all my boys and one gun doesn't work. Im not happy with this, if I buy stuff in the stores I never have a problem. Always something with Amazon so sad every time!
customer_reviews.author: Candi Schaedel

customer_reviews.title: These work well.
customer_reviews.text: This set was purchased for Christmas for my 9 year old grandson. He liked them so well, that his parents ordered more, so that he could have several friends over and play together. They have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: These are the best
customer_reviews.text: Great for a variety of ages and both girls and boys had fun with these Laser guns. They are a big favorite at our house!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M. Bernier

customer_reviews.title: super fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: my sister and new husband enjoy a tipsy game of running around their house and having nerf gun wars. but it can become frustrating keeping track of and hunting down all the bullets. this takes away all the mess and leaves you will all the fun!

customer_reviews.title: they had fun
customer_reviews.text: they loved the toy and they used a lot and my son and his wife played to

customer_reviews.title: Great laser tag set
customer_reviews.text: We got this set for Christmas and everything worked perfectly eight out of the box. We haven't fully tested the range yet but I know they work at least a distance of 20 ft. All of the different gun settings were cool and fun.

customer_reviews.title: ... gun didn't work when received which led to some disappointed kids.
customer_reviews.text: One gun didn't work when received which led to some disappointed kids.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good laser tag blaster
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty well constructed, accurate, pretty lights / sounds, and good selection of 4 weapons. Similar products we have tried are complete disasters.

customer_reviews.title: Great laser tag
customer_reviews.text: Super cool laser tag set. My 6yo loved therm and we like playing with him too!

customer_reviews.title: These are so awesome. Huge hit with the kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: These are so awesome. Huge hit with the kids and adults. Good range and forgiving (don't need pinpoint accuracy to register a hit). Batteries seem to last as well (Been played with for hours and still no issues).
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: ... - but I note they do have sales 😉 Love that you can expand and even add the capture ...
customer_reviews.text: Little costly - but I note they do have sales 😉 Love that you can expand and even add the capture the flag set
customer_reviews.author: Denise A. Dicianni

customer_reviews.title: We love these and just bought 2 more
customer_reviews.text: We love these and just bought 2 more. We play laser tag almost every day now. It has a very long range. We even played it at the park, ducking behind trees. Love this product
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: It's a hit!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old love it! More accurate than I thought it would be. He has used it pretty hard for 2 months now and no problems so far. So glad I got this one instead of the one with the target you have to wear. It would be annoying to put that on everytime you want to play.
customer_reviews.author: JEP

customer_reviews.title: Xmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Xmas gift. I took it out & it looks like it will be lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Warrene M.

customer_reviews.title: they are 5 and 7 and they loved these.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my nephews...they are 5 and 7 and they loved these...played all afternoon!

customer_reviews.title: One gun was great
customer_reviews.text: Like some other tenors said one gun kept malfunctioning. All we had to do was reset it each time, but can be a nuisance.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! We got 6 so the whole family can ...
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! We got 6 so the whole family can play and we are having a great time with them. No more getting hit in the head with nerf guns!

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Uses AA batteries
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Uses AA batteries. My son has a good time with it. And he's rough with his toys, so this is holding up pretty good.

customer_reviews.title: Husband and son love these

Although we did have a little problem with trying to get the right batteries because not any AAA batteries would work. Wish they would come with batteries because the batteries died really fast.

customer_reviews.text: I have a dynasty set, bought these and they work with the dynasty set. In fact you can't even tell them apart. They are exactly the same, every decal. I wouldn't doubt they are from the same factory. You just don't get the cool case the dynasty ones have.

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products Set of 2 Kids Infrared Laser Tag Blasters for Kids & Adults w/ 4 Settings, Multiplayer Mode, Lights, Sounds - Multicolor
product_meta.description:
Video game action leaps off the screen and into your backyard. Players 1 and 2 have entered the battle! With built-in infrared receivers to track hits, and multiple gun modes to use in combat, these guns will keep everyone active and moving around. 

Specifications: 
Overall Dimensions (per gun): 12"(L) x 2"(W) x 7"(H) 
Weight: 4.18 lbs. (2.09 lbs. each) 
Material: Plastic 
Battery Requirements (per blaster): 4 AA (not included) 
Recommended for ages: 3+ years 
ASTM-certified 
Minimal assembly required (with instructions) 

Package Includes: 
(2) Blaster tag guns 

 
No eye-protection is needed. Our blasters have been tested by a 3rd party product safety facility and determined to emit safe, infrared (non-visible) lights at less than a 1mW power output. It is similar to the lights used in a garage opener or TV remote. They do not exceed Class 1 Laser Product Limits and are in conformance with Code of Federal Regulations 21 CFR 1040.10.
feature_bullets: MULTIPLAYER & TEAM PLAY: Battle friends or team up with the multi-player mode, and use more sets to add as many players as you want
4 BLASTER SETTINGS: Choose from Pistol, Shotgun, Submachine, and Missile launcher. Each has different ammunition levels and can be changed during battle
LIFE INDICATORS: 3 lights indicate how many lives you have left with each player given 9 lives (1 light= 3 lives) for each battle
